features: ENCOURAGE NATURAL SPINAL CURVATURE –– The ElevateEase lumbar support cushion champions the proper alignment of your spine. Crafted with high-density memory foam, our lower back pillow eases pressure on back muscles while facilitating a neutral spinal position. Ideal for chairs, cars, and wheelchairs, these back pillows foster a healthier sitting posture.

EXTENDED SEATING COMFORT –– The ElevateEase tailbone seat cushion for desk chair is your partner for enduring comfort during prolonged sitting periods. It's perfect for those expecting a baby, recovering post-surgery, frequent travelers, or daily office-goers. Let our tailbone cushions for pressure relief augment your comfort during work, leisure reading, or movie nights.

UNPARALLELED COVER DESIGN FOR AIR CIRCULATION & SOFTNESS –– Each back support pillow and travel seat cushion in our set comes with two distinct outer shells – breathable mesh and plush velvet. The mesh cover of our desk chair cushion promotes optimal air circulation for a cooler seating experience. The velvet cover adds a luxurious feel to your memory foam cushion, enhancing coziness.

OPTIMIZE COMFORT & BALANCE –– With our memory foam chair cushion, enjoy steady support whether you're working remotely or in an office, or preparing for academic challenges. Our tailbone pillow chair seat cushion duo evenly distributes weight and offers additional pelvic support, diminishing backaches and muscle tension, letting you concentrate on your tasks.

VERSATILE, NON-SLIP DESIGN WITH LIFETIME WARRANTY –– Our coccyx office chair cushion and lumbar back pillow adapt to a range of chair sizes and styles without slipping, thanks to their non slip surface and adjustable straps, respectively. Ideal for long commutes and journeys, our ergonomic seat cushion set combats fatigue by providing a supportive surface. Backed by our robust Lifetime Warranty, we ensure a superior, long-lasting product for your peace of mind.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Achieve Daily Comfort, One Seat at a Time! The ElevateEase memory foam seat cushion and lumbar support set ensures optimal support whether you're at work, on the road, or at home.

Best of Both Worlds Includes Both Mesh and Velvet Covers Breathable Mesh to Keep You Cool Enhanced Air CirculationIdeal During Hot & Humid WeatherMachine Washable Cozy Velvet for a Touch of Luxury Exceptionally Soft & SmoothExtra Warmth During Colder MonthsMachine Washable Our memory foam seat cushion and back support pillow bundle for office, car, truck, and more has the support you are looking for all year round.

One Seat And Back Support Cushion Bundle, Lots of Relief Supportive Design for Better Productivity Helps With Coccyx and Tailbone Pain Relief and SupportHip and Lower Back Pain Relief and SupportMiddle and Upper Back Pain Relief and SupportHelps Improve Posture and Spine AlignmentProvides Comfortable and Supportive Seating

Feature Packed Design Breathable Mesh & Luxurious Velvet For a touch of cozy elegance, wrap your ergonomic chair cushion in the velvet outer shell. For optimal airflow, use the breathable mesh shell to keep you cool. Both are easy to remove and machine washable. The Comfort of Memory Foam Whether you're working at your desk or watching a movie, add a boost of comfort with a high-density memory foam computer chair cushion set of 2 to help make sitting for extended periods more enjoyable. Ergonomic Design Take your U-shaped cushion seat with built-in handle and your lumbar chair support with adjustable back straps on long commutes, overnight flights or on vacations. Non-Slip Base Maintain a safe and secure seating position on any surface. From your car seat to your office chair, the non-slip memory foam seat pad and lumbar support with fasteners stay in place without shifting

All Day Seating Comfort At The Office Survive long meetings and hectic work sessions with our seat cushion and back support pillow set for office chairs that shape themselves to your body. Say goodbye to uncomfortable desk chairs and hello to a cozy, more productive work experience. Your Trusty Travel Companion Minimize body strain and discomfort during those long hours on the road with proper tailbone and lumbar support for car. The additional layer of support helps you keep you comfortable on short and long drives and allows you to focus on the road ahead. Easier Long Term Seating Creates a supportive and well cushioned surface for wheelchair users. Support daily well-being with this memory foam chair cushion and lumbar support pillow, and help provide relief to your lower back, hips, and tailbone through long sitting periods and recovery times. Relax at Home with Extra Support Use these chair pads and back supports for your dining chair or other in home seating to enjoy better posture, spinal support, and tailbone/coccyx pain relief while you work, study, or relax throughout the day. Get Work Done For The Road Ahead Comfort For All Home Seating Elevated
Your Seat Cushion and Lumbar Support Bundle For Elevated Comfort Say Farewell to Stiff, Achy Backs and Say Hello to a More Relaxed and Enjoyable Journey

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy beyond belief!
reviews.reviewText: The quality of this product is top-notch. It is extremely comfortable. I put this in my car and it makes my driving experience a lot more comfortable.I am thinking about getting another one for my chair in my house. I love the quality of the memory farm. This product supports my back and allows me to sit. I would definitely recommend this product to anyone and everyone. The price is amazing for a product like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This Is Great For Back - Best Foam Cushion Seat
reviews.reviewText: The "This Is Great For Back - Best Foam Cushion Seat" truly lives up to its name! This foam cushion seat has been a game-changer for my comfort, especially during long hours at my desk. The cushion is incredibly comfortable and provides excellent support for my lower back.Its ergonomic design ensures that I maintain good posture throughout the day, relieving any discomfort or pain. The quality of the foam is top-notch, and it has retained its shape and firmness even after extended use. I highly recommend this cushion seat to anyone looking for a comfortable and supportive solution for their back.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Incredible support !!! Never thought I'd be able to sit comfortably after several spine surgeries. Best cushion & lumbar support. Great quality!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well made and comfortable
reviews.reviewText: The product feels very well made, and the fresh cloth feels very nice unlike some rough mesh that I've felt before. it also comes with a second velvet cover that is silky smooth. The foam insert feels very supportive and is comfortable to sit on and the back pillow supports my lower back very well. One thing I'd like to mention is that swapping out the cover is a bit tricky. You'll want to bend and shape the foam insert so it fits as far forward as possible into the cover (kind of like putting a foot into a rolled up sock ) but once you fit the insert into the cover, the fit is nice and snug. Overall, I'd say I'm happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This foam back support/seat cushion is so soft and comfortable. It completely supports my back and I feel like I’m sitting on a cloud.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars BEST Cushion ever
reviews.reviewText: its comfortable and it feels great since I am short it helps my posture and I love it I feel I can see every thing better since I'm higher

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I like the two piece set but I do use them in different places. The back support is on our desk chair. Keeps slipping down and we adjust it. the straps are useless. The bottom cushion is used as a loose cushion that I can put where I need it. Very comfortable. I did not use any of the covers as they were very tight and impossible to put on. Don't need them anyway. Quality is very good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Useless product. Not comfortable at all.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for my office chair and it is far from comfortable. Thought this would be larger than it is. Front edge of the seat cushion only extends to mid thigh and rubs the back of your thighs. Contemplating returning this to Amazon. Back cushion is absolutely useless. I do not recommend this to anyone.Update: After sitting on this cushion for another week, I just can't stand it and will be returning the set. This might work for a child or smaller individual, but not for a full-size adult.
Me encantó el producto,muy cómodos y precio super accesible.
Cumple con su función, es muy cómodo
Esperaba un poco más de firmeza, pero no esta mal, cómodo sobre todo el soporte lumbar.
Buena calidad, cumple con lo anunciado
No se deforma y es muy cómodo
